No. 46658) Subject: Interest Rate Applicable for HAM Projects-Interest_under_clause 23.6.4 This is with regard to the amended Model Concession Agreement for Hybrid Annuity Mode Projects. As per requirements of Article 23.6.4 "Interest shall be due and payable on the reducing balance of Completion Cost at an interest rate equal to the average of one year MCLR of top 5 Scheduled Commercial Banks   plus 1.25%" The footnote specifies that "the Authority shall declare the list of 5 Scheduled Commercial Banks on 1st September every calendar year based on the Balance Sheet size as declared in their Annual reports The 1 year MCLR of the 5 Scheduled Commercial Banks shall be taken at the start of every Quarter" _ 2_ Accordingly, Authority hereby declare the 5 Scheduled Commercial Banks along with their oe year MCLR (rate of interest) , applicable as on 1st Jan, 2021. The list of banks shall be next reviewed on 1st September 2021 and the rates shall be published for 1st of every quarter. 3_ The rates for 5 Scheduled Commercial Banks are as below: 1 Year MCLR in % Rate applicable for the Sr .
